summary: Implements the SQLAlchemy-backed persistence layer for TagStudio, defining custom column types, enumerations, ORM models, field abstractions, and the library interface that manages database initialization, CRUD operations, tagging, metadata handling, search, backup, and import/export.
business_intent: Provide a reliable, featureâ€‘rich data storage solution that allows TagStudio to store, organize, and retrieve media entries, tags, user settings, and custom metadata efficiently, supporting advanced queries and data management tasks.
